exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface rvtsi : requestVote_term_sanity_interface h : name net : network st' : name -> data ps' : list packet gd : electionsData out : list raft_output d : raft_data l : list (name * msg) client : clientId id : nat c : input H : handleClientRequest h (snd (nwState net h)) client id c = (out, d, l) H0 : gd = update_elections_data_client_request h (nwState net h) client id c H1 : forall (t : term) (h : name) (h' : Net.name), currentTerm (snd (nwState net h')) = t -> votedFor (snd (nwState net h')) = Some h -> t <= currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) H2 : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net H3 : forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d) h' H4 : forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \\/ In p' (send_packets h l) t : term h0 : name h' : Net.name H5 : currentTerm (snd (nwState {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} h')) = t H6 : votedFor (snd (nwState {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} h')) = Some h0 Unable to unify "?M1635 <= currentTerm (snd (nwState net ?M1636))" with "t <= currentTerm (snd (nwState {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} h0))".

original: intros. unfold refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request, votedFor_term_sanity. intros. apply H1; auto.
